body:
Add a package for sniffles.

As this package stands, the only thing that it installs is a copy of `libz.a`.

I *think* that the problem is that the cmake config files don't set up an install target.  Or perhaps it's broken.  I'm not cmake-savvy enough to tell.

[Here are the installation instructions](https://github.com/fritzsedlazeck/Sniffles/wiki#how-to-build-sniffles).

Before I do something silly, like `mkdir prefix.bin` and then `cp ../bin/sniffles*/sniffles prefix.bin`, is there a better way?
title: Add package for Sniffles
